articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft and Amazon face UK regulator investigation over cloud services - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft faces more cloud headaches in the UK as the CMA starts a new investigation into public cloud infrastructure. Amazon and Microsoft will both be investigated.
articles.content:
